title: ACM Kickoff
description: Our big start to the semester! Students met the ACM E-board, learned about upcoming events, and connected with peers in CS/IT.

title: ACM x Amazon
description: A hands-on session with AWS, led by Aditya, introducing cloud computing concepts and how students can leverage AWS for projects and careers.

title: General Body Meeting
description: Regular check-in for ACM members to discuss upcoming events, share opportunities, and foster collaboration.

title: ACM x CrowdStrike
description: Special talk with CrowdStrike professionals focusing on Digital Forensics and Incident Response (DFIR) in cybersecurity.

title: General Body Meeting
description: Another chance for members to gather, collaborate, and stay updated on ACM activities.

title: ACM Halloween Bake Sale
description: A festive, Halloween-themed fundraiser with spooky treats to support ACM events and initiatives.

title: General Body Meeting
description: Engagement session for ACM members to network, plan, and prepare for November/December events.

title: ACM x Spotify
description: Exclusive talk with Jolina, a Spotify Security Engineering Intern, sharing her journey, internship experience, and career insights.

title: General Body Meeting
description: Final check-in before December events, with updates on semester wrap-up and future planning.

title: Techincal Portfolio Workshop
description: Final check-in before December events, with updates on semester wrap-up and future planning.

title: General Body Meeting
description: End-of-semester gathering to reflect on accomplishments, provide feedback, and preview spring activities.
